text: Vital installations across the district have come under security force in the wake of terrorist attack in Pathankot in Punjab. One team of striking force had been deployed to monitor Tuticorin airport. Subramanya Swamy Temple in Tiruchendur and other religious sites, railway stations and bus stations were also under the police scanner, Superintendent of Police Ashwin M. Kotnis told The Hindu . Patrolling along coastline had also been strengthened, sources said.
title: Security strengthened
